docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Hi, I'm Tharun Teja Mogili, a passionate data scientist and software engineer. I specialize in data analysis, machine learning, and software development.

docs.title: Background
docs.text: I have a Bachelor's degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Vasavi College of Engineering, and I am currently pursuing a Master’s in Engineering Science (Data Science) at SUNY Buffalo.

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Data Analysis
  • Machine Learning
  • Software Development
  • SQL & Java
  • Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn)

Feel free to explore my work and get in touch if you have any questions or opportunities!

docs.title: Cardiovascular Disease Prediction Model
docs.text:
• Description: Developed a cardiovascular disease prediction model using Pandas for data preprocessing and R for visualization. Achieved high accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-scores.
  • Technologies: Python, Pandas, R
  • Link: Project Repository

docs.title: Excel Comparison Macro
docs.text:
• Description: Created a macro to compare two Excel sheets, reducing manual effort by 60% and improving efficiency.
  • Technologies: Excel Macros
  • Link: Project Repository

docs.title: Game Concept for Learning Python
docs.text:
• Description: Designing a game to teach basic programming skills in Python with an adventure genre and cartoonish visual style.
  • Technologies: Python
  • Link: Project Details
